resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108195</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108195</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974101</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Poverty Curriculum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Armut-Lehrplan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Programme d'études de Pauvreté</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Curriculum Da Pobreza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma di studi Di Povertà</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα σπουδών ένδειας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Plan de estudios De la Pobreza</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Seven units that explore the interconnected causes and effects of poverty. What does it mean to be poor? What are the best ways to fight poverty? Activities, discussion, role playing.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sieben Maßeinheiten, die die verbundenen Ursachen
und die Effekte der Armut erforschen. Was bedeutet sie, schlecht
zu sein? Was sind die besten Methoden, Armut zu kämpfen? 
Aktivitäten, Diskussion, Rolle Spielen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sept unités qui explorent les causes et les 
effets interconnectés de la pauvreté. Que signifie-t-elle pour
être pauvre ? Quelles sont les meilleures voies de combattre la
pauvreté ? Activités, discussion, jeu de rôle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sete unidades que exploram as causas e os efeitos 
interconectados da pobreza. Que significa ser deficiente? 
Que são as mais melhores maneiras lutar a pobreza? 
Atividades, discussão, jogar do papel.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sette unità che esplorano le cause e gli effetti 
collegati di povertà. Che cosa significa essere povera? 
Che cosa sono i modi migliori combattere la povertà? 
Attività, discussione, gioco di ruolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επτά μονάδες που ερευνούν τα διασυνδεμένα αίτια και 
τα αιτιατά της ένδειας. Τι σημαίνει για να είναι φτωχό; 
Ποιοι είναι οι καλύτεροι τρόποι να παλεφθεί η ένδεια; 
Δραστηριότητες, συζήτηση, υποκριτική ρόλων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Siete unidades que exploran las causas y los 
efectos interconectados de la pobreza. ¿Qué significa ser 
pobre? ¿Cuáles son las mejores maneras de luchar pobreza? 
Actividades, discusión, el jugar del papel.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974101</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108195</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/poverty-curriculum</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
